name: 天天萌泡泡
description:
"天天萌泡泡" is a cartoon-style elimination game with a relaxed atmosphere, suitable for playing for a while at leisure.
【Game Operation】
Click the bubble with the left mouse button, if there are more than 3 bubbles of the same color connected together, they will disappear.
【Game Features】
There will be cool special effects when the bubbles disappear. Some props will appear in the game. After clicking, a large range of bubbles will disappear.
